site_name: Plot H11B Within Land Bound By Plot H11A And Elephant Park To The North Rodney Place And Rodney Road To The East Heygate Street To The South And Plot H7 To The West
description: Details of condition 9 'Obscured glazing to be provided' as required by permission ref. 23/AP/1230 dated 07/09/2023 for 'Non-material amendments to reserved matters approval ref. 18/AP/1863 dated 28/09/2018 (Application for the approval of reserved matters (access, scale, appearance, layout and landscaping) for Plot H11B within Elephant Park (previously referred to as the Heygate Masterplan), submitted pursuant to the permission ref: 12/AP/1092. The proposals comprise the construction of two buildings of between 11 and 25 storeys in height (maximum building height 84.2m AOD) comprising 259 residential units, 285 sqm (GEA) flexible retail, office, community and leisure uses (Classes A1-A5/B1/D1/D2), cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, landscaping, new public realm, and other associated works). The amendments include:Increased floor area and massing of the tower and mansion block to accommodate a second fire escape stairAmended layouts of the residential units and balcony locations on the tower and mansion blockChanges to ground floor (residents entrances, cycle stores, bin stores, switch room and Maddock Place retail unit) of both buildingsChanges of the tower knots from glass to metalChanges to the material detailing of the tower balconies from back painted glass with glass balustrades to profiled aluminium facade with vertical metal slat balustrades, and amended balcony designBalcony changes to the mansion block from perforated metal to flat metal vertical slatsRemoval of planting on the ground floor of the Heygate Street elevation Removal of planting on the canopies of levels 1 and 2 on the tower and revised canopy designIncrease in the size of the internal amenity area on level 24Amend facade detailing and brickwork to the mansion block, planting omittedNew substation locationRemoved tower vertical feature lightingAmendments to the roof terrace of the mansion block and stair core enclosure, etc'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
